mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EDITOR VALUES(EDITOR_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{target_user_seq}, #{target_category_seq}, #{title}, #{content}, #{pic1}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT TITLE, E.SEQ, CONTENT, PIC1, (SELECT TITLE FROM EDITORCATEGORY WHERE SEQ = E.TARGET_CATEGORY_SEQ) AS CATEGORY, T.NAME FROM EDITOR E, TRAVELER T WHERE T.SEQ = E.TARGET_USER_SEQ ORDER BY E.REG_DATE DESC

SELECT NVL(count(*),0) AS cnt FROM EDITOR WHERE 1 = 1
AND TITLE like '%'||#{s_keyword}||'%' AND CONTENT like '%'||#{s_keyword}||'%'

SELECT*FROM (SELECT E.SEQ, E.TITLE, E.CONTENT, (SELECT TITLE FROM EDITORCATEGORY WHERE SEQ = E.TARGET_CATEGORY_SEQ) AS CATEGORY, T.NAME, E.REG_DATE, T.PROFILE, LEAD(E.TITLE,1) OVER(ORDER BY E.reg_date DESC) NEXT_TITLE, LEAD(E.SEQ,1,0) OVER(ORDER BY E.reg_date DESC) NEXT_SEQ, Lag(E.TITLE,1) OVER(ORDER BY E.reg_date DESC) PREV_TITLE, Lag(E.SEQ,1,0) OVER(ORDER BY E.reg_date DESC) PREV_SEQ FROM EDITOR E, TRAVELER T WHERE T.SEQ = E.TARGET_USER_SEQ ) WHERE SEQ = #{seq}

SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) AS cnt FROM PLANER WHERE 1 = 1
AND TITLE like '%'||#{s_keyword}||'%' AND CONTENT like '%'||#{s_keyword}||'%'

SELECT TITLE, SEQ, CONTENT, PIC1,CATEGORY, NAME, like_count FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY E.REG_DATE DESC) as rnum, TITLE, E.SEQ, CONTENT, PIC1, (SELECT TITLE FROM EDITORCATEGORY WHERE SEQ = E.TARGET_CATEGORY_SEQ) AS CATEGORY, T.NAME, (select count(*) from liketable C where E.seq = C.target_bbs_seq and C.bbs_category=3) as like_count FROM EDITOR E, TRAVELER T WHERE T.SEQ = E.TARGET_USER_SEQ ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC ) A WHERE rnum between 1 AND 6
SELECT T.NAME, T.PROFILE, E.CONTENT, E.REG_DATE FROM TRAVELER T, EDITORCOMMENT E WHERE TARGET_EDITOR_SEQ=#{target_editor_seq} AND STATUS = 0 AND T.SEQ = E.TARGET_USER_SEQ ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC
